sentences.sContent: This paper approaches English euphemisms from Peirce s semiotics.

sentences.sContent: With the aid of concepts in topology such as space, region, boundary and displacement, Lotman described the space structure of cultural semiotics.
sentences.sContent_eng: With the aid of concepts in topology such as space, region, boundary and displacement, Lotman described the space structure of cultural semiotics.
sentences.sCn: 洛特曼借助拓扑学中空间、域、界、移等概念，对文化符号域的空间结构进行了描述。
